thread.title: Your Favorite 'Lord of the Rings' Characters Reunited for a Heartwarming Photo
thread.title_full: Your Favorite 'Lord of the Rings' Characters Reunited for a Heartwarming Photo

author: michelle@dailydot.com (Michelle Jaworski)
title: Your Favorite 'Lord of the Rings' Characters Reunited for a Heartwarming Photo
text:
Photo via dom_monaghan_/Instagram Five companions. So be it. 
The Fellowship of the Ring had a unique and incredible bond, one that certainly extended to the cast during the years of filming the Lord of the Rings trilogy concurrently. And it seems as though that bond is still there after more than half of that fellowship reunited —many of them for the first time since they made and promoted the films. 
Dominic Monaghan shared photos of the reunion on Instagram as he, Viggo Mortensen, Orlando Bloom, Elijah Wood, and Billy Boyd readied themselves in battle position to take on that cave troll. They might not have had the bows and swords of their characters (although Bloom prepared to draw back an invisible arrow). But they were prepared. A photo posted by Dominic Monaghan (@dom_monaghan_) on Jan 30, 2017 at 7:15pm PST The cast—including Ian McKellen , Sean Astin, Sean Bean , and John Rhys-Davies, who weren’t part of the photo reunion— recently reunited (in print) to interview one another for the 15th anniversary of Lord of the Rings for Empire Magazine . And while some their hair has grayed a bit since the last time we saw them together, it feels like nothing has changed. Only this time around they have smartphones to document it all. A photo posted by Dominic Monaghan (@dom_monaghan_) on Jan 30, 2017 at 8:05pm PST A photo posted by Dominic Monaghan (@dom_monaghan_) on Jan 30, 2017 at 8:06pm PST
